At GYANT (gyant.com) weâ€™re building an intelligent, empathetic medical conversational AI that can ask you questions and give you a diagnosis and personalized health advice when you're sick. Our mission is to revolutionize access to and ease of medical diagnosis for millions of people around the world. To date we have helped over a million users! We use Node.js/Python, microservices, and lots of machine learning / NLP.

We are hiring a senior software engineer and senior data scientist. See: https://angel.co/gyant/jobs or email kirill (at) gyant.com.
